pullrequest.title: Model submission for X4 sensor config 2

content.raw: The `<pose>` should use the `_z` parameter with an offset to take into account the vertical dimension of the vehicle. Eg. `#{_z + 0.2}`. The `_roll`, `_pitch`, `_yaw` parameters should be used as well. See #!/osrf/subt/pull-requests/332/do-not-merge-example-team-robot-submission/diff?w=1#Lsubmitted_models/husky_migration_sensor_config_1/launch/spawner.rbT16.
content.html: The <pose> should use the _z parameter with an offset to take into account the vertical dimension of the vehicle. Eg. #{_z + 0.2}. The _roll, _pitch, _yaw parameters should be used as well. See #!/osrf/subt/pull-requests/332/do-not-merge-example-team-robot-submission/diff?w=1#Lsubmitted_models/husky_migration_sensor_config_1/launch/spawner.rbT16.
